thread.section_title: InMyArea.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InMyArea.com | inmyarea.com | 3 of 41
thread.title: Bill Clemens

author: Bill Clemens
title: Bill Clemens
text: Call cable company direct. This just confuses things and has no value. I cancelled my order after waiting several days for direct tv to call to set up installation. Instead I got an email with a number to call to set it up and when I did the said they didn't have anyone to send and the would call back in a couple of days . I called dish directly and they came out next day. I spent about 3.5 hours on the phone using this company with nothing to show for it. Still have to see if I get my deposit back.
